function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 disproportionately affecting vulnerable populations","Impact":"Increased suffering and risk of infection within marginalized communities","Mitigation":"Equitable access to healthcare, support for vulnerable populations, and targeted public health interventions","Technologies":"Telehealth, remote monitoring, and digital health resources","People":"Poor, Indigenous peoples, single parents, women, refugees, asylum seekers, sex workers","Owner":"Healthcare providers, public health authorities, and government agencies"},{"Description":"Structural issues exacerbating health and safety risks in the built environment","Impact":"Increased health and safety compromises for marginalized individuals in crowded shelters and long-term care facilities","Mitigation":"Structural changes to improve living conditions, equitable housing policies, and support for vulnerable populations","Technologies":"Urban design and planning, affordable housing initiatives, and community-based support programs","People":"Vulnerable populations, individuals in crowded shelters and long-term care facilities","Owner":"Urban planners, policymakers, and community organizations"}]}
